card.name: Dimension Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Invincible Cataclysm
card.text: ■ Choose up to 3 of your opponent's shields and put them into his graveyard.

card.name: Siren Concerto
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a card from your mana zone into your hand. Then put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.text: ■ Metamorph

card.name: Noble Enforcer
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature can't be attacked or blocked by creatures that have power 2000 or less. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, creatures that have power 2000 or less can't attack or block.

card.name: Shadowwave Cyclone
card.text: ■ Cyclone ■ Choose a card in the battle zone or either player's mana zone, and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Last Violence
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Destroy one of your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent chooses 2 non-multicolored cards in their mana zone and puts them into their graveyard. ■ Search your deck. You may take a multicolored creature from it, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Bloody Cross
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then your opponent puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their graveyard.

card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Knight Magic

card.name: Oboro Kagerou, Moonlight Mecha
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw a card for each civilization in your mana zone. Then put the same number of cards you drew from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Logic Circle
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, and show that spell to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck and put that spell on top of your deck.

card.name: Hell's Hot Spring
card.text: ■ Destroy all creatures that cost 3 or less.

card.name: Codenight Star in the Love
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy all other creatures. If you do, put all your shields into your graveyard. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Carol, Gokigen Shout
card.text: ■ When this creature would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have a water card and a fire card in your mana zone, return this creature to your hand instead.

card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Recycle

card.name: Myscu, Mirage
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then that player shuffles their deck and reveals the top card. If it's a creature, that player may put it in the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Revolution Taiman
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature. Until your next turn, that creature gets +4000 power and can't attack players. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, until the start of your next turn your opponent's creatures can't attack you.

card.name: Bolmeteus Black Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

card.name: Phoenix Life
card.text: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your shields face down, and put the other into your mana zone.

card.name: Bolberg "Shori" Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Samurai Generation ■ You may cross your cross gear with this creature For No Cost

card.name: Zakira, Ultimate Lifeform
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ You may summon this creature from your graveyard.

card.name: Parasking, Revolution Invasionkind
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Triple Breaker ■ Your cards in the battle zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, your creatures may cost up to 5 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Overkill Graveyard
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures gets "slayer." ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)''

card.name: Bell Hell De Skull, Moon Reaper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a card from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand.

card.name: VV-8, Forbidden Machine
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Put 3 seals on this creature. ■ Forbidden Mechanism: When this creature has no seals on it, take an extra turn after this one. ■ Seal

card.name: Mishra, Triple Star Iron Man

card.name: Jojojo Jokers
card.text: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a Jokers creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Bainaradoor
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

card.text: ■ Your Jokers cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Faywon, Green Knowledge Silver

card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put a card from your hand into your mana zone.
